website_summaries.verdict: An unrefined healing clay that delivers an all-in-one skin care treatment.
pros: Can be used in mud face and hair masks, along with acne treatments, soaps, and shampoos
Contains silica, calcium, and other powerful ingredients
Designed to prevent redness and itching after use
Sold in a convenient 2 pound bottle
cons: More expensive than many comparable options
Powder is chunky and has a pungent odor

website_summaries.verdict: This versatile product is safe to ingest and contains no fillers, additives, or preservatives. In addition to drawing out toxins from the body, it can be used on skin, hair, teeth, and even for your pets.
pros: This clay helps a range of things in addition to its cleansing effect – inflammatory responses, food poisoning, chronic diarrhea, headaches, yeast infections, UTI, and acne
cons: Product is clumpy when mixed with water, which can make it difficult to drink

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I am exploring this product's many uses. For now, I have mixed it with ACV to apply as a mask and as an armpit detoxifier. This stuff draws some funky stuff out of the pores. Huge reduction in blackheads on my nose. Used under the arms (every other day) has eliminated the need for deodorants! Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: kwy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for a colon cleanse
customer_reviews.text: Got to tell you, I use this as part of a colon cleanse and this this stuff is pretty powerful. I would highly recommend having a tablespoon olive oil if you're going to do this because this stuff will dry your colon out it may cause constipation but not likely. I used a tablespoon of this with a tablespoon of psyllium husk, with a tablespoon apple cider vinegar and a teaspoon of Organic Raw honey. Mixed all of this into a cup and a half of lukewarm water. Do not mix in hot water or it'll get chunky really fast. Drink it fast. Do this for about 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Tuco

customer_reviews.title: This is working well for my digestive issue. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is working well for my digestive issue. It's true that it does not dissolve in water or juice readily. However, I have found if I put a spoonful in water and leave it overnight or at least for an hour or two, it does absorb the liquid and I am able to then stir it up and drink it without lumps.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Strong binder
customer_reviews.text: Powerful binder and detox. Just remember start lower to see how you'll react and take 2 hours from other meds/supplements. Don't let metal contact it. I use for help with Late stage Lyme, EBV etc related issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie In NY

customer_reviews.title: The Purge
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME! I've made a face mask and it works great! however, i will mention that it will detox the skin. so any white heads or mini cysts under the skin will rise. It will look like a break out, however your skin is purging. I had some mini cysts I've been trying to get ride of. the next day they had finally appeared and I could extract them. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Powder
customer_reviews.text: Bentonite clay is a miracle powder that I use for everything from clearing out toxins. I have used it to save pets from poisoning and to pull poison from spider bites out. Its also the main ingredient in my homemade toothpaste. Thank you so much for the prompt delivery and quality.
customer_reviews.author: BurningtreeDryad

customer_reviews.title: Great for detox!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fine texture, worked well with our heavy metal detox (chlorella, cilantro, bentonite clay & activated charcoal). We both feel better! It also worked well for skin treatments, food soaks & so on. I will keep it in the house at all times from now on.
customer_reviews.author: becksnyc

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product
customer_reviews.text: I use this clay to add to my cats' wet food as a means of enhancing their health and helping with occasional loose stool problems and also to worm them and to eliminate intestinal parasites. It works well. Tasteless so when I mix the powder with their wet food, they do not taste it nor do they seem to notice that it has been added to their food. Highly recommended for pet care - and for humans too
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Bad label - not for internal detox
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer labels says "food grade." Don't make the same mistake, contrary to what this label says, it is NOT the correct type to do an internal detox. This is sodium bentonite. Detox bentonite is calcium bentonite. DO YOUR RESEARCH and you will see. Buy the correct type. Manufacturer label is crap. Having said all of that, this is fine for external skin and other uses.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sears

customer_reviews.title: Very Pure
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice powder. Very fine powder. Was fantastic as a face mask. My skin hasn't felt that smooth in a really long time, if ever. Nice product. Not gritty at all. I put about a tablespoon in a glass of about 8 oz of water, let it sit overnight. In the morning I drank the water that was at the top for the alkaline properties (it tasted so pure even though it was cloudy from the clay). Then I used the moistened clay at the bottom as my facial mask. This is my new source for Sodium Bentonite clay.
customer_reviews.author: Pala

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to break down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bent taking clay for several years now, every 6 months I do a six week treatment. I usually get if from Europe and wasn’t able to get it this time so I decided to buy this clay. It might be a good product, I really couldn’t tell cause I wasn’t able to consume it. It just wouldn’t brake down and dissolve in water. It just gets this late lumpy and sort of slimy. Never had this problem with other clay.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin and recommended for the elimination of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for your skin and recommended for the elimination of impurities. I have used it externally on my skin and ingested it as a supplemtent against yeast.
customer_reviews.author: Storming Mountain

customer_reviews.title: but amazed at growth of tooth enamel where I previously had ...
customer_reviews.text: Received in Dec. 2016..have been using this externally and internally, but amazed at growth of tooth enamel where I previously had a cavity. Great for facials too.
customer_reviews.author: DELIBERATE

customer_reviews.title: So much cheaper than toothpaste and better for my health
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a tooth powder. I used the whole 2 lbs with 2 cups soda and 1 cup activated charcoal. I've been using it for about a month and the combination does seem to be slowly whitening my teeth. So much cheaper than toothpaste and better for my health.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stature

customer_reviews.title: Im impressed
customer_reviews.text: My weight is coming off much faster with this, cellulite is coming off. I take it with olive oil, honey, flax seed, apple ci. vinegar. It doesn't tased great but its tolerable and for what it does, is well worth
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Sky

customer_reviews.title: Big clumps
customer_reviews.text: It turns into one big clump when mixed with hot, warm or cold water. Other brands I've tried didn't do this.
customer_reviews.author: sharon inglis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dissolve well in the bath
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use for detox baths but found it doesn't dissolve as well as the other clay we've tried. It clumps up and is in slimey little balls. I even tried to dissolve it in a cup of water and whisk it before adding it to the bath. The only thing that worked was to make a clay smoothie in my Blendtec before adding it to the bath. NOT worth the hassle!! If you're buying this for the bath, I'd suggest to look further.
customer_reviews.author: Sharla

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I have felt like a new person since I started the Bentonite Clay! Digestive system clear, Lots of energy!
customer_reviews.author: tdt8494

customer_reviews.title: Good clay, wasteful package.
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality clay, I just wish it came in a recyclable or compostable container. Trying to reduce waste by making my own hygiene/ beauty products is hindered when the items to make the products come in plastic waste containers themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Guzewich

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a while ago, but stopped using it because it's hard to mix compared to another brand of bentonite I've purchased. The company communicated with me well after my initial purchase. I tried to use it again today for a hair mask, but there were a lot of lumps despite how long I mixed it with a plastic fork. I added acv although that would alter my recipe, but it still did not work mix well. All in all, it's ok but it doesn't work well for me and the purpose for why I bought it
customer_reviews.author: D. Baylor

customer_reviews.title: Slice of amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works miracles. I have arsenic toxicity so I'm always looking for alternatives. My husband was feeling really crummy, fever, body aches, red goopy eyes, that Natalie bad breath, I coated his whole face & bald head w/ a mask, by the time it dried he was feeling 100% better! No fever, no red, goop, or smell!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Moore

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn't Dissolve Well In Water
customer_reviews.text: If you ingest clay for health purposes... beware... this clay will NOT dissolve well in water! It sticks to the spoon, it sticks to the glass, it clumps, it will NOT sufficiently stir in so you can drink it. I wish I had my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McHale

customer_reviews.title: great for heavy metal detox bath
customer_reviews.text: Great for heavy metal detox bath! Also for many other things, but that is what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Marie

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item for my horses that had raging ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my horses that had raging diarrhea after eating toxic plants. My vet tried biosponge which did help but the condition kept returning 12 hours after the last dose. I put them on this clay for a week along with a little grain and their stools returned to normal, seemed to also sooth their stomachs. I started by offering a little raw sugar with the clay then tapered off each dose until it was just the clay and they ate it licking the pan clean.
customer_reviews.author: karrie smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because of the low amount of contaminants. Some bentonite clay will have excess amounts of heavy metals. Chelated or not, I don't want to ingest any more heavy metals than I have to. I use this in my quarterly detox protocols. Every three months, for one week, I will ingest a tablespoon in the morning. Afternoon I take diatomaceous earth and C60 charcoal in the evenings. I am not a doctor, I am a nutritionist and health coach. This is not medical advice. This is my personal experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Strangely this clay tastes good to me. Perhaps there is some trace mineral my body is looking for. Mixes well into everything and no overwhelming taste.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Too much dirt particles in clay
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I had used another of their products before and liked the quality, so I thought I would try their clay. It is awful. It has so much dirt particles in it that I feel like I am using sand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic clay.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for oral health and have no complaints. I somewhat prefer the sodium style of clay because it is from Wyoming, which presumably has a lot less probability for radiation exposure than the calcium variants from the Mojave Desert might have. It's not that I don't like that clay, it's just that I am not totally convinced it is radiation free. This stuff was quality and easily wets down. This stuff is wonderful for oral and gut health. Use with caution obviously and read up on the clay if you consume it in small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: CrankTop Contributor: Rock Music

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful way to detox
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality powder, I use a small teaspoon in my smoothies. It's important to leave the blender on for a sufficient amount of time (1-2 minutes) to make sure the powder is thoroughly blended, otherwise it will become lumpy and hard to drink. I also have used it for the occasional small blemish on my skin, mixing it into a paste and leaving it on until it dries.
customer_reviews.author: L. pierce

customer_reviews.title: I found if I mix it with water at night ...
customer_reviews.text: I found if I mix it with water at night it's ready for the next morning, it mixes well then, and of course I mix two tablespoons of Psyllium husk in the morning and down the hatch. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the product and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make anti-perspirant deodorant. It worked perfectly! I have an 8 year-old son who does martial arts and this is what I needed. I wore it to Disney one weekend and never had any issues. I've also use daily it as a face mask - my skin felt so smooth! I'm very pleased with the product and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Path

customer_reviews.title: Problems mixing with water
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this as a face mask or in a bath but I bought this food grade clay to drink also. When I mix the clay in water there is a lot of random looking things undisolved in the water. Im not too sure if i want to take this internally.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Too gritty for toothpaste, but otherwise excellent
customer_reviews.text: The powder feels as soft as it can be, and it makes a great face mask once water is added. However, while it feels perfectly smooth on my hands and facial skin, if I put any in my mouth, I can detect a lot of grit, and I think this particular brand is too abrasive for toothpaste. I bought it for toothpaste, but replaced it with another product. I am using this for facial masks, and it is wonderful for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Annakelly

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bentonite clay available
customer_reviews.text: I use bentonite clay for a lot of things: teeth cleaning, facials, internally, hair wash, bath soak. I love this brand. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: christiana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all! UNHAPPY Customer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product thinking that it would be an easy application clay mask for the body, but was extremely disappointed. I did exactly as it says on the package and it the consistency was like a glue. It didn't spread at all. I had to remove clumps from my shower. I was looking forward to using and thought it would be like any other clay mask I've used before, but not. I wish I cold get my money back, but unfortunately I don't think that will happen. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: LUA GLOBAL PRODUCTS

customer_reviews.title: Love this clay!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this clay for face masks, with the Apple cider vinegar mixture. It leaves the skin feeling soft and looking beautiful!. In a perfect world, the packaging would be a little better thought through because things can get pretty messy really quickly if you are not super careful with each scoop... But that’s my only complaint:)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Three days I have used this clay and every time I do a face mask with the apple cider vinegar it feels like my face is pulsing!! It’s the strangest/coolest thing like it’s actually pulling toxins out or to the surface. Haven’t used internally yet, but I have read to take a 1/2 teaspoon with apple cider vinegar because the vinegar helps nutrelize the sodium.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S

customer_reviews.title: Worst bentonite clay I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst bentonite clay I’ve ever used. I regularly use Redmond’s and Aztec, but thought I’d try this because I thought it would be a better value, but I was wrong! It clumps and is unusable for face masks, baths, and/or with my psyllium husk drinks. I never write bad reviews, but this was really bad. I’ll be tossing it and reordering my regular brands. So disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Becomes cement!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I received a bad batch or what, but as soon as I mix this with any sort of liquid, it balls up and becomes hard. Regardless of the type of liquid and the ratio of clay to water, it just balls together and becomes hard. I am pretty sure that it plugged up my sink because of how thick and hard it becomes. Do not let it rinse down your sink!! I have used lots of different brands of clays, muds, and powders for both internal use and to make facial masks, and I have never experienced any like this with any other product. It is so weird. I will never buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Alaman

customer_reviews.title: Good product.. bad package
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, however the packaging is not so much.. the seal at the top of the package was open so the product got over everything..everything else in the box.. my doorstep.. my coffee table.. my carpet.. not a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.author: Starving student

customer_reviews.title: Good Brand, works well, recommended
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1. Pure Bentonite Clay 2. Works well for Detox 3. no bad odors 4. Good for cleaning skin 5. Soothes bee stings, or scratches. 6. Draws out toxins Cons 1. a little expensive 2. Takes a little too long to receive item Overall I like the product and will buy again, I will just look for other places to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JHenson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: While I was a first timer to bentonite clay, this product seems like an excellent way to enjoy it. I decided to try it as a face mask to help with acne, and it has definitely made a difference. I did struggle with mixing and application at first but once I got that down the clay was very invigorating on my skin. Have tried eating any yet lol but maybe one day.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the grit
customer_reviews.text: I previously used Yerba Prima Bentonite and it was good. I tried this one only because it was well marketed and a good price. Since this is a product that was supposed to be consumed internally and also exterally, I did not expect it to contact sand/grit. It does work well and is very comparible to yerba prima, however Yerba Prima had absolutely no grit. This product has grit that makes you feel like it will take away your enamel over time.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man

customer_reviews.title: ... grade bentonite to do a cleanse and it is perfect! It also has no fillers
customer_reviews.text: I needed a food grade bentonite to do a cleanse and it is perfect! It also has no fillers, binders, additives, chemicals or preservatives. It's ultra fine and blends well and I've had great results! Much love to Fossil Power!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Sodium Bentonite Clay, Definitely Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great colon cleanse. You will need to add to water and wait for a few hours (shake occasionally) for it to mix. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BigXor

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with my results!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my recent purchase of Bentonite clay. I have used it as a face mask and the results have been amazing. I read up on the benefits of the clay and have begun ingesting the recommended amount on a daily basis have not noticed results but it has only been a few days. I will definitely reorder and refer this product to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: marion

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Feeling so much more alert & less lethargic since doing my bentonite cleanse! I definitely recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: First time using bentonite clay, so I wasn’t sure what to expect. This product is very fine and powdery with no clumping. Using it for DIY tooth powder. I’ve only been using it a few days, so I can’t comment on whether it re-mineralizes teeth, but it does work well for brushing. My teeth feel very clean. It’s also gentle. My teeth are sensitive, and Sensodyne toothpaste actually hurts when it touches my teeth. This doesn’t hurt at all and makes brushing much more pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: C Chris

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose skin, hair, teeth care product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for our home made tooth powder, skin and hair care. Works great as the base for the tooth powder - finely ground, so ready to use. Works well as a face mask - I have dry skin so I mix this with a little coconut oil so it doesn't dry my skin out more, and when I wash it off, my face feels marvelous. I love it. Plan to use it as a hair treatment, too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueenBee

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, it is very good quality & it is great for homemade toothpaste & deodorant. It also makes your skin sooo soft after it's used as a mask. I did have to put it into a canister for ease of closing, but I kept the label for the handy recipes.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: To cleanse and clear crystal necklaces...
customer_reviews.text: This powder has been fantastic for cleansing my therapeutic grade crystal necklaces and the light color does not rub off onto the necklace either. Really enjoying this product and thinking of trying as a clay mask in the future. As I use so little of it each time, this bag should last me quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: the good thing is I was having like fever
customer_reviews.text: Its food grade but When I put in my water ,its become bigger and doent disolve ... the good thing is I was having like fever , I made a mask and put in my face and my neck and feel better :)
customer_reviews.author: jeny

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but I'm having a difficult time using this product. I've used diatomaceous earth before and thought this would be similar but I can barely get it down. I can't get it to dissolve and it makes me gag. I have most of the bag left and probably won't use it again. I know the benefits can be immense when using to detoxify.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I use bentonite clay in my baths, use it as a clay mask, and internally in my smoothies. I do not feel as toxic now that I started using it. I also use lemons a lot as well. It came Ina timely manner so no issues with the seller they were good.
customer_reviews.author: sheloah

customer_reviews.title: Not for toothpaste- sand sized granules in here like rock.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased quite a bit of fine bentonite clay for toothpaste making and ovreally detox in the past. I would not at all recommend this for toothpaste. We have found many large sand sized granules in here that were almost like ltitle pieces of rock. Again- not at all recommended for toorhpaste. The bad we received was not fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lopez

customer_reviews.title: i am sure that I will be happy with that product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot really give any reviews on the bentonite clay that I purchased because I haven't got the chance to use it yet. However, do to many of the positive reviews, i am sure that I will be happy with that product. I brought it as a dual purpose, that for my hygiene kit that I will make aka toothpaste and deodorant and for my first aid salve and drawing salve. And in the worst case, i can use as is for the runs and for a poultice. I will give a main review once my products are made.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteTail1776

customer_reviews.title: Unusable. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. I’ve used bentonite clay many times so know what the consistency should be. This crap won’t mix with liquid no matter how slowly it add it or how hard I stir. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Using in toothpaste remineraliing formula
customer_reviews.text: Just started using, I am 63 and have several health issues, many of the med's I take cause dry mouth, and other issues, which have ruined my teeth... Getting much decay.... So I am hoping the remineralizing toothpaste made with this clay, will help heal my cavities and keep the right balance ph level to correct my saliva...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I searached for Calcium Bentonite Clay and this came up ...
customer_reviews.text: I searached for Calcium Bentonite Clay and this came up so I ordered it. It is not Calcium Benitonite Clay.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict Ulcak

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The down side is the clumping when mixing for ingestion . But with a little practice you get past it . Really felt a good internal cleanse. Using it on my skin was truly amazing . Used it on my sun damaged chest . Not only took the cracking away but made me so soft as well . Fantastic in my hair as well. I'll be a regular user of this product for sure
customer_reviews.author: Daddyo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this stuff in many different ways. Didn't notice a difference in my digestion (other than an upset stomach) or skin quality. I had really high hopes after reading reviews and anecdotes from others. What's left is just taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Kline

customer_reviews.title: great product, arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: It is helpful to premix the clay with other dry ingredients (protein powder, diatomaceous earth, spirulina) before adding water the clay is very finely ground and can be hard to dilute.
customer_reviews.author: mz. liz.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you’re drinking it!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY if you intend to use this for internal consumption. Does not mix - turns lumpy and slimy, does not dissolve in water. Not a ‘good’ taste either - I’ve used much higher quality Bentonite and while it’s never pleasant, it doesn’t have the foul taste that this one does. Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: It is great for facials
customer_reviews.text: There is so much you can do with Bentonite clay. It is great for facials. Achey muscles. Draws metals from skin( Go to Dr Axe for some good info) This is a very good quality Food Grade.. Be careful there are cheaper brands but not good. They have contaminants
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Padley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the benefits of the product. I used it internally and the taste was surprisingly mild. In addition, I created a hair, body and facil mask. The clay along with a vegan alkaline lifestyle Has dramatically improved the condition of my skin. My skin and hair is healthy and glowing. I'm so amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this product to drink it. I have heavy metal poisoning from a copper iud. I don’t think I’ve ever felt worse than when I drank it. I couldn’t find any peer reviewed studies on humans for its dietary detoxing capabilities as well. I read that it can take out the bad but also the good. It can also contain lead. So now I just use for baths and face masks and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: This was not what I am used to out of ...
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I am used to out of a bentonite clay..It was very difficult to mix and clumped instead of becoming a smooth paste it was a lumpy mess, going back to Redmond!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We have used this Bentonite clay in detox baths. I also added some to my natural plant based toothpaste (emptied the tube into jar) because I had read about it helping support oral health. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it whitens teeth.
customer_reviews.author: texasmama22

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with my gluten and dairy sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and as expected. Seems to help with my gluten and dairy sensitivity. Like anything else, you need to find the right balance for yourself. It can back you up.
customer_reviews.author: SIVA ONES

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this product. The clay is so fine that when I add it to water it is not in the least bit grainy and most of the particles stay suspended in the water. I let it sit for 3 minutes to let the heavier particles rest on the bottom and then drink up. It's really a beautiful clay...I recommend whole heartedly. : )
customer_reviews.author: Rubytwoshoes

customer_reviews.title: Feels just like I had my teeth cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this twice a day to brush my teeth. Always feels like I just got my teeth cleaned! My dentist was very pleased. I will be trying the other uses listed on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Konopka-Skirkanish

customer_reviews.title: Food grade doesn't mean you should eat it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for internal use if you want to be extremely constipated. This is sodium montmorillonite, which may be "food grade" in the sense that it does not contain toxins, but has not been carefully studied for internal use. For an internal treatment, you probably want calcium montmorillonite instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it for my acv mask my skin looks ten times better after just a week of use. You can't go wrong with good bentonite clay a little acv and a little filtered water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great for the face mask
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a face mask and for internal cleansing. It was great for the face mask. For me it was too strong for internal cleansing. I will have to take a lot less next time. 1 tsp and a lot of water was too much for me. It made me constipated. But for others I know it worked great for them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Root

customer_reviews.title: Sodium Fossil Bentonite Clay Food Grade
customer_reviews.text: There is a big difference between the clays, I mistakenly bought this fossil Bentonite because seen food grade, I meant to buy the calcium clay. This clay is very clumpy and hard to dissolve in water for drinking or bathing (my hair got knotted and had to cut 2 clumps off of hair from tangling). It is a great pultrise and face mask, please remember to to put oils back into skin after use as very drying. This is beneficial for disaster and has many uses around the home and personal care use.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: You should try it
customer_reviews.text: Me and .y husband take a teaspoon of it every other day for health. We poor it in a small cup of water let it sit for 2 hrs or more and then drink it. So healthy
customer_reviews.author: MIRIAM DEL

customer_reviews.title: I love this clay!
customer_reviews.text: I use my clay to make a face mask. It has done a fantastic job on my skin. You can see where it's drawing things out and helping me feel better. I absolutely love this product. I'm also using it to brush my teeth to help remineralize my teeth. And the two weeks I've been using it I am beginning to have less pain in my mouth! That is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: BritneyV

customer_reviews.title: It's been very helpful for my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help balance my alkalinity in my stomach. It helps me deal with my allergy to Candida. It also works very well as talcum powder. I use this product every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Butters

customer_reviews.title: Almost tasteless.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for intestinal health. Used it for a facial, which is what it is mostly used for. It really cleanses the skin, but I left it on a little too long and my face started itching. Noticed in my research that some people drink huge amounts daily. When I realized how drying it was, I decided to use it once a week sometimes every two weeks. Very happy with this brand and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Great natural remedy!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous natural clay. Used for poison ivy rash and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Flex1987

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The worst clay I've ever used!! Its next to impossible to dissolve it in any liquid. I bought it to use in face masks - forget about it! I tried to use it for baths - it was a disaster. I mixed it with a glass of water in a blender and drank before going to bed - had a stomach ache and couldn't sleep all night. Had to throw it away. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Marca

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product and for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product and for the cost. I've been using it as a natural toothpaste just by put a scoop in a container, dipping a wet toothbrush in there and then brushing away. I haven't used regular toothpaste since! I am disappointed it did not work out as a mask for me however. I gradually combined it with apple cider vinegar but i just couldn't get the clumps out.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: neutralizing toxins from a bite
customer_reviews.text: It is working great on a spider bite to draw out the toxins.
customer_reviews.author: M. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Incredible multipurpose product
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! I use it orally to help fight candida, as well as face and hair masks. It makes my skin glow and feel baby soft, while it makes my hair super soft, manageable and so shiny! The best part is that a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  O'Melia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Clay Mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this for at home clay masks!! My skin is amazing afterward!!! I was drinking it mixed w/H20 or tea, but haven’t continued....my daughter claimed it’s a great colon cleanse!!
customer_reviews.author: s k s

customer_reviews.title: ... the powder to make my toothpaste and I'm very satisfy with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the powder to make my toothpaste and I'm very satisfy with it. Quality seems good and it's working wonderfully on my teeth. Will definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not For Detox/ Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for detox, but after months of use, it made me worse off. I feel that this product is more harmful tham good. I have tried another clay, Yerba Prima, with no damage done. However I now prefer Zeolite and will probably use clay sometime later in the future, and will most likely purchase from trusted sources.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: i like the smell that this powder has
customer_reviews.text: i bought this to make my first diy deodorant. i like the smell that this powder has, and the quality seems pretty good. my product was shipped out very soon after i placed my order. i can't wait to try this in other natural recipes, i would recommend this to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: kristin wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this clay to make tooth powder, foot soak and hair cleanser. It's working great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this clay to make tooth powder and it's working great. It's very fine and blends well. I also use it in a foot bath. It is a little hard to dissolve in water, but it does with a lot of mixing. I also use it with Rhassoul clay to make a detoxifying hair cleanser. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shimmer

customer_reviews.title: very leary
customer_reviews.text: So far not happy. I wanted it to make toothpaste. It is extremely difficult to mix with other ingredients. It clumps . Doesn't dissolve in anything. Most of it dos down the drain. I tried a mouth rinse. Doesn't dissolve in water at all. Impossible to not end up with clumps of clay in a glass of water. I hope its benefits , claimed, are true.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It calmed the inflammation and had a cool, soothing feel
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a mask for sebhorric dermatitis around my hairline and forehead. It calmed the inflammation and had a cool, soothing feel.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Petrossian

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and it's great!! We use it as a diaper powder ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and it's great!! We use it as a diaper powder and no more yeast rash!!! I'm still waiting to try it a toothpaste but that is soon to come.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: !!!GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i have only used it twice in face masks, and i love it!! But the main reason why i bought it was to make a black drawing salve. I havent been able to make it due to me missing 1 ingredient (its on the way) but i am very anxious to make my salve🤗🤗
customer_reviews.author: Azucena Castillo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE REAL CLAY
customer_reviews.text: This clumps and does not absorb like the real bentonite. the real clay does not float on top of the water like product did
customer_reviews.author: Just fine

customer_reviews.title: Axe recommended your Bentonite Clay Food Grade Powder
customer_reviews.text: I'm very thankful that Dr. Axe recommended your Bentonite Clay Food Grade Powder. I'm still taking it one tsp per day in my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that it would not dissolve in water, just a big muddy mess. I guess good for masks etc but I purchased it for internal uses which did not work.
customer_reviews.author: KellyF

customer_reviews.title: Product is as listed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to give to my dogs. Everything’s going fine. I gave myself a facial the only thing I would change I will use lemon juice instead of vinegar. Vinegar is not pleasant to have in your face for a long period time
customer_reviews.author: LyndaL

customer_reviews.title: ... that this product is of very high quality and useful for many purposes
customer_reviews.text: My early impression is that this product is of very high quality and useful for many purposes, especially since the preparation is a fine powder that can be used for many purposes. I bought to include in my homemade toothpaste. I may try it for other uses too.
customer_reviews.author: David Shannahoff

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Like quality and use in making tooth powder for teeth brushing.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: Well when I opened the package there was clay all inside the shipping bag. I took out the Clay bag and noticed a punchture in the bag. Very hesitant to use the product because who knows if someone put something in the bag. But I tried it as a mask and used ACV and it was hard to mix and way too much ACV! But I left it on and it was very hard to remove the product. Skin was so dried out! I later that night I tried it with water to drink and no way was that going to mix up!! So I am going to give up I guess. 😥
customer_reviews.author: Jrene Brown

product_meta.title: Bentonite Clay Food Grade Powder - 2 LB Pure Natural Powder for Internal and External Use - Great For Detox,Toothpaste, In Smoothies and More - Heal Damaged Skin - DIY Clay Face Treatment, Etc
feature_bullets: √ SUPERIOR: Enjoy our high quality, 100% Unrefined and Pure Sodium Bentonite Clay, an extra fine powder with no fillers, binders, additives or preservatives

√ SAFE AND EDIBLE: Our Bentonite Clay is safe to ingest. This edible supplement mayhelp rid your body of foreign substances and harmful toxins. It may help you feel energized and reduce those lingering headaches

√ ALL IN ONE TREATMENT: No need for an expensive kit, this Bentonite Clay does it all; Have fun with DIY projects at a cheaper cost, easily whip up mud face and hair treatments, teeth, clay baths, acne treatments, and even deodorant
√ SKIN SOOTHER: Rich in organic minerals such as silica, calcium, iron and potassium. Rejuvenate your skin with intense hydration, suppleness and radiant glow. No itching or redness after using!
